name: mole
title: Mole
description: üêπ Deep clean and optimize your Mac with Mole ‚Äî all within Raycast.
author: doeshing

commands.name: mole
commands.title: Mole
commands.description: Main menu ‚Äî access all Mole features

commands.name: clean
commands.title: Mole Clean
commands.description: Deep cleanup ‚Äî scan and free up disk space

commands.name: optimize
commands.title: Mole Optimize
commands.description: System optimization ‚Äî maintain and tune your Mac

commands.name: status
commands.title: Mole Status
commands.description: System health ‚Äî CPU, memory, disk stats

commands.name: uninstall
commands.title: Mole Uninstall
commands.description: App uninstaller ‚Äî remove apps and leftovers

commands.name: analyze
commands.title: Mole Analyze
commands.description: Disk explorer ‚Äî browse folders by size

commands.name: purge
commands.title: Mole Purge
commands.description: Clean project build artifacts (node_modules, target, dist)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
